name: Relic Rush (Breda University of Applied Sciences)
name_original: Relic Rush (Breda University of Applied Sciences)
description:
Description

Relic Rush is a singleplayer 2D platformer where you take control of an adventurer, going from temple to temple, in order to steal ancient relics.  Be careful, because as soon as you take a relic, the temple activates all sorts of traps. Whip and shoot your way out of the temple alive before it crumbles to the ground!

Made By Team 9 HP:

Attila Szücs
Eileen van Zijtveld
Radu Tandarica
Rick de Haan
Ties de Groot
Vincent Godding

Relic Rush is a game made by students of Breda University of Applied Sciences, of the Creative Media and Game Technologies academy. The game is made in block B (System Design) and block C (Level Design) of Year 1, Design & Production, 2020-2021.

Controls:

9 HP's Relic Rush is not associated to Netherweb Studio's Relic Rush, the names are purely coincidental.
